location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Reproduction of a map showing the route through the Khureba [Al Khuraybah] Pass, signed by Major A Crawford of the Royal Artillery, and dated 18 August 1903. A dashed line marks the route, with various features indicated and annotated along the route: valley sides, paved roads, walls, springs and wells, cultivation, culverts.
